item.name: manager and admin can see all user profile list
manager and admin can see any user profile ..... empID required in URL
admin can update employee data........  empID required in URL
forgot password otp verification and reset password
get all projects 3 details .....   ID , name , code
update project data ......  projectID required in URL
get all subcodes related to that project .... projectID required in URL
update project subcode ...... subcode ID required in URL
get all subcodes activities related to that subcode ... subcode ID required in URL
updated project subcode activity .....   activity ID required in URL
get projects details and linked key details ..  projectID required in URL
get all projects details and linked key details ....    ( not recommended )
manager can see only those projects where he/she is manager
manager can see all user working in one particular project ( only his project )....  projectID  required in URL
employee can see their timesheet data last 15 days Copy
employee modify daily timesheet data ..... timesheet data ID is required in URL
employee can see their timesheet data week numbers list
employee can see their timesheet data based on week .. add week number in URL
employee can see their timesheet data week number base on status type .. save , submit,  approve
manager get user list of not approve timesheet .... projectID required in URL
manager get user timesheet .... projectID , empID , year_week required in URL
admin retrieve all weeks of an employee ... empID required in URL
admin retrieve employee particular week data ....   empID and  year_week required
admin approve/reject one month data Copy
retrieve leave all application ID and empID who applied
employee update leave application .... leave application ID is required
